data.lyric:
[ti:摇滚唐人街 (《唐人街探案2》电影推广曲)]
[ar:汪苏泷]
[al:摇滚唐人街]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]摇滚唐人街 - 汪苏泷 (Silence Wang)
[00:02.82]词：王家杰/任盈洁
[00:05.65]曲：王宗贤/下川和己
[00:08.48]制作人：王宗贤/下川和己
[00:11.30]配唱制作人：任寒冰/陈嬛
[00:14.13]录音：任寒冰@行人Studio
[00:16.96]发行公司：北京听见时代娱乐传媒有限公司
[00:19.79]Chinatown a world full of dreams
[00:21.91]But opportunity isn't as easy as it seems
[00:24.25]You gotta rise up to the extreme and work like busy bee
[00:26.98]Channel all your energy to fulfill your fantasies
[00:29.36]City lights what a sight crawling over the night
[00:31.75]Shaped like bright fireflies and dragons with a bite
[00:34.28]This is Chinatown nothing here is black or white
[00:36.57]Fireworks ignite this is a city that excites
[00:39.01]Welcome to my world Chinatown 唐人街
[00:43.38]
[00:44.06]各个是高手
[00:45.77]又怎样 唐人街
[00:48.09]
[00:48.94]要世界转我的方向
[00:52.55]唐人街
[00:53.04]
[00:53.86]火力全开呐喊着梦想
[00:58.07]向前闯
[01:03.85]
[01:08.74]Working long nights but I'm acting brave
[01:10.98]I am in charge of the road I pave
[01:13.43]It's time for me to complete this race
[01:15.80]Finish out the day strong in first place
[01:18.20]Here I go again in Chinatown doing my daily grind
[01:20.88]Daily climb up to my apartment stairs I don't mind
[01:23.47]I just hope its a sign that if I try I will find
[01:25.83]A place like this all the time
[01:27.04]Everywhere in all mankind
[01:28.42]Welcome to my world Chinatown
[01:31.75]唐人街
[01:32.42]
[01:33.09]各个是高手 又怎样 唐人街
[01:37.09]
[01:37.93]要世界转我的方向 唐人街
[01:42.00]
[01:42.84]火力全开呐喊着梦想
[01:47.18]向前闯
[01:52.94]
[02:02.28]Chi-na-town
[02:07.75]If you feel lost or torn apart
[02:09.06]
[02:09.68]If you need to depart for a fresh start
[02:12.20]If you need to move to a new city
[02:14.47]If you need to find a new committee ask
[02:17.23]
[02:18.51]Chi-na-town
[02:19.90]Welcome to my world Chinatown 唐人街
[02:23.58]
[02:24.43]各个是高手 又怎样 唐人街
[02:28.68]
[02:29.34]要世界转我的方向 唐人街
[02:33.54]
[02:34.23]火力全开呐喊着梦想
[02:39.27]Welcome to my world Chinatown 唐人街
[02:43.30]
[02:43.95]胆敢小看我的力量 唐人街
[02:48.29]
[02:48.88]快放手一搏 别傍徨 唐人街
[02:53.20]
[02:53.78]越战越勇气魄震全场 向前闯
